info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:17AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hamilton, west central Warren, northwestern Fulton and Herkimer Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 116 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cold Brook, or 14 miles north of Herkimer, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Indian Lake, Speculator, Old Forge, Mohawk, Frankfort, Dolgeville, Ohio, West Winfield, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Newport, Stratford, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Moffitt Beach Campground and Nicks Lake Campground. People attending Herkimer County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29A and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
